definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: By linking Micro-computer and the 721-Spectrophotometre together, the automatic operation of the 721-Spectrophotometre is realized.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了利用微型計算機與721型訂光光度汁相聯帆。

sentences.english: Specifically, luminosity is proportional to radius squared.
sentences.chinese: 具體來說，光度與半徑的平方呈正比。

sentences.english: Stars are also classified by their luminosity under the Morgan-Keenan system.
sentences.chinese: 恆星在MK系統下，也經常根據光度分類。

sentences.english: Thus, the Se contents in oyster can be measured by Catalytic-kinetic photometry.
sentences.chinese: 應用催化動力學光度法可以測定牡蠣中硒的含量。

sentences.english: A new ultraviolet spectrophotometric method is proposed for the determination of N-benzylglycine ethyl ester.
sentences.chinese: 建立測定苄基甘氨酸乙酯的紫外分光光度法。

sentences.english: It was found that the decrease of absorbance of guest-host cell is almost proportional to the exposure time and light intensity.
sentences.chinese: 發現賓主盒吸光度的減少幾乎正比於暴光時間和強度。

sentences.english: A spectrophotometric method for determining rhenium content in Pt Re reforming catalysts is reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用分光光度法測定重整催化劑中錸含量的方法。

sentences.english: Methods Determination of the use of infrared spectrophotometer.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用紅外分光光度計測定。

sentences.english: Photocells are also used in photometry and spectroscopy.
sentences.chinese: 光電管也應用於光度學和光譜學。

sentences.english: The binding reaction of Bismarck Brown R and nucleic acid was studied by the spectrophotometric method.
sentences.chinese: 利用分光光度法研究了俾士麥棕與核酸的結合作用。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a rapid method of identifying some drug tablets by infrared spectrophotometry .
sentences.chinese: 目的建立快速鑑別藥物片劑的紅外分光光度法。

sentences.english: This infrared spectrophotometer has given a constantly good performance.
sentences.chinese: 這臺紅外分光光度計一直運轉良好。

sentences.english: A benzfluorenone spectrophotometric method is introduced for the determination of germanium in organic germanium beverage.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了測定有機鍺飲料中的鍺的苯芴酮分光光度法。

sentences.english: It usually shows up more as speed and aperture increase.
sentences.chinese: 當感光度和孔徑增加的時候，這種現象往往會加重。

sentences.english: Why can the content of mebendazole of this compound tablet be assayed by the spectrophotometric method?
sentences.chinese: 本品中甲苯咪唑的含量爲什麼可以用分光光度法測定？

sentences.english: The spectrophotometer UV365 is a research grade instrument with the double-monochromator.
sentences.chinese: UV365分光光度計是一臺雙單色儀研究型儀器。

definition: contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
